name: Sugar Free Natura Sachets
description: Sugar Free Natura Zero Calorie Sweetener 100 Sachet. It gives you the natural sweet taste of sugar, without the harmful calories. It helps you control caloric intake & keep fit and is ideal for all fitness seekers and weight conscious people. 1 sachet is equivalent in sweetness to 2 teaspoons of sugar. *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
